prompt_1.prompt: Complete the following story: The insurgents hide in the forest in Nottinghamshire. They are planning their next attack on the army checkpoint. The insurgents realize what is going on and decide to abandon their base. They pack their tents and their weapons, and move to the forest in Oxfordshire.
